title: File transfer window does not open when I connect to PC via USB
content:
I have followed the instructions about connecting my phone to my PC and selected File Transfer. My Win 10 PC recognises the phone as a Google Android device, but it will not show up in the File Manager, so I cannot transfer any files. My Win 10 is on version 2004 and my phone is using Android 10.

The cable I am using worked for transfer with my previous phone, a Moto G.

Any advice?
